propositions.text: The document is titled '重生之米虫人生'.
It contains an '序章' (Prologue).
The prologue includes a '序' (Preface).
It contains a '正文' (Main Body).
The main body is structured into 20 chapters.
Chapter 1 is '重新开始' (Starting Anew).
Chapter 2 is '校园生活' (Campus Life).
Chapter 3 is '意外的相遇' (Unexpected Encounter).
Chapter 4 is '改变的轨迹' (Changed Trajectory).
Chapter 5 is '青春的萌动' (Budding Youth).
Chapter 6 is '挑战与成长' (Challenges and Growth).
Chapter 7 is '梦想的启航' (Setting Sail for Dreams).
Chapter 8 is '崭新的篇章' (A New Chapter).
Chapter 9 is '走向未来' (Moving Towards the Future).
Chapter 10 is '幸福的约定' (Happy Promise).
Chapter 11 is '情感的升华' (Sublimation of Emotions).
Chapter 12 is '事业的开端' (Beginning of a Career).
Chapter 13 is '甜蜜的日常' (Sweet Daily Life).
Chapter 14 is '责任与担当' (Responsibility and Commitment).
Chapter 15 is '温暖的守护' (Warm Protection).
Chapter 16 is '爱的延续' (Continuation of Love).
Chapter 17 is '岁月的沉淀' (Precipitation of Years).
Chapter 18 is '终点的开始' (The Beginning of the End).
Chapter 19 is '爱的归宿' (The Destination of Love).
Chapter 20 is '幸福的未来' (Happy Future).
It concludes with a '尾声' (Epilogue).

concepts.name: 重生
concepts.context: Title of the document, implying a theme of rebirth or reincarnation.

concepts.name: 米虫
concepts.context: Part of the title, often implying a simple, perhaps unmotivated or insignificant life, which may be contrasted with the protagonist's journey.

concepts.name: 人生
concepts.context: Part of the title, meaning 'life'.

concepts.context: Structural element, meaning 'Prologue'.

concepts.context: Sub-section within the prologue, meaning 'Preface'.

hierarchy.structure: The document is organized hierarchically, starting with a main title, followed by a prologue section ('序章') which contains a preface ('序'). The main content is presented in a body section ('正文'), which is further divided into twenty numbered chapters. The document concludes with an epilogue ('尾声').
